existing_features.title: Add a 'Move' action to each file in the TechnicalFileRow component that opens a folder selection dialog
Create a folder selection dialog component that displays the technical folder hierarchy and allows selecting a destination folder
Create useMoveFile React Query mutation hook that calls the backend move function and invalidates technical folder queries on success

new_feature_requests.summary: Move uploaded files from technical folder to created folders
Implement backend Motoko function to move a technical file from one folder path to another, preserving the file content and metadata
Update TechnicalFolderPage to refresh the file list after a successful move operation
